original_title: Rudolph Valentino - Idol of the Jazz Age
overview: A short look back on the legacy of Rudolph Valentino, produced by Castle Films for the home gauge market. Multiple versions of the short film exist- one with spoken narration and music, and one in silent form. Reportedly a big moneymaker for Castle-- and proof of Valentino's lasting appeal.
title: Rudolph Valentino - Idol of the Jazz Age
